question: Who has won the 2017 men's singles Mutua Madrid Open tennis tournament?
explanation: Rafael Nadal, a Spanish professional tennis player, has won the 2017 men\'s singles Mutua Madrid Open tennis tournament by defeating Dominic Thiem of Austria in the final by 7–6, 6–4 in Madrid, Spain. It is his 5th Madrid Open title. With this win, Nadal ties Novak Djokovic with 30 ATP World Tour Masters 1000 singles titles.
